modName: Dremora Overhaul And Playable Mod Skyrim
summary: This is a Dremora overhaul. It changes the Dremora of skyrim to the newly Update Elder scrolls Dremora in ESO and you also can play as them as if they were meant to be a playable race in game.
descriptionHtml:
[b][i]Sorry but I will no longer be editing this mod. Go to Facebook " https://www.facebook.com/SkyrimModsForPc/ " page to see what i'm doing now.[/i][/b]

I will no longer be updating this mod

This is a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] overhaul. It changes the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] of[size=2] [b][i][url=https://elderscrolls.bethesda.net/skyrim]Skyrim[/url][/i][/b][/size] to the newly Update Elder scrolls [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] in [url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Elder_Scrolls_Online]The Elder Scrolls Online[/url] and you also can play as them as if they were meant to be a playable race in game.

[b][i][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora][size=6]Dremora[/size][/url][size=6] Overhaul Mod For [/size][url=https://elderscrolls.bethesda.net/skyrim][size=6]Skyrim[/size][/url][size=5] 

Please endorse this mod in you like!
[/size]
[size=6]NEW UPDATE[/size]

[size=4]New The Hunt Update
[/size]
:Added Daedric Dougeon In Fungal Grotto
:Added Portal Locations to hunt
:New scamps!!!<br/>:New Enemys

[color=#f6b26b]Hunt down those evil daedra before they do harm.Daedric Hunt Locations clues.

Exterior Daedric Location

:Near Solitude Swamp half Snow.
:A Fort Near Whiterun's Tower, Secret Entrance.
:Bleak falls barrows Stairs View of Riverwood.
:A boat behind Golden Glow Estate.
:On top of the tallest Mountain in plain site.
:Labyrinthian Entrance.
:Let Molag taste the FUSRODAH.
:Behind Mehrunes Dagons.
:Near Azura's Shrine.
:Outside Of the Markarth Sewers
:SkyHavens Temple's Backyard

Interior Daedric Locations

:In a Prison Cell in the Abandon Prison.
:The Biggest Mushroom of all of BlackReach.

God Spawn Location

:On a mountain behind Wind-helm[/color]
[/i][/b]
This mod allows you to play as a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url]. You can fully customize him or her to you liking. There is face paints, [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] Horns and hair styles.
To play as a [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] use [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)]Console[/url] ShowRaceMenu or a mod to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20394/]ShowRaceMenu[/url].
[b][u][size=3](Modder)[/size][/u][/b]
[font=Tahoma]Want to fight [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url]'s, Type in [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Console_Commands_(Skyrim)]Console[/url] [b][url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url]Test[/b], This will show the code to spawn 1 code to spawn all the types of [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] randomly. Please note that the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] are more advanced then your usual Skyrim fights. They have classes. Tank, Necromancer, NightBlade, IceMage, FireMage and StormMage.
[/font]
[b][u][font=Verdana][size=4]Oh did I say you are the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dragonborn]Dragonborn[/url] as well? YES THATS RIGHT!! Custom voices made for shouts for the [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Dremora]Dremora[/url] male and female![/size][/font]
[color=#ff0000][size=6][i] Please Report All Errors! [/i][/size][/color][/u][/b]
[youtube]pJSKtzxq11A[/youtube]
[youtube]o9vBH9lcl-A[/youtube]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=4][b]Feel free to post photos or make a video ;)[/b]
[/size][size=4]Remember to endorse if you like this mod :D [/size][/font]
[i][b][u][size=6]Feel Free to visit my Skyrim mods page and my YouTube.[/size][/u][/b][/i]
[size=5][url=https://www.youtube.com/user/DeadraStep]DeadraStep - YouTube[/url]
[url=https://www.google.com.au/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=6&ved=0ahUKEwiAltPFrv7PAhWHopQKHd_tAKwQFggxMAU&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2FSkyrimModsForPc%2F&usg=AFQjCNEUHJHTUUQgNXEZ03Jfs54x00e3ew&sig2=r3X6cjdAYs1tsLfwF2olrw&bvm=bv.137132246,d.dGo&cad=rja]Skyrim And Fallout Mods For Pc | Facebook[/url]

[/size]
[size=5]Does this replace the original dremora?[/size]
[size=4]No, not the race but it does replace the spawn of all the Dremora in the game. like in Azura star, or Mehrunes Dagon shrine, and were ever else that there are Dremora. So basically, you wont see the default Dremora, but you still can spawn and play with them.[/size]
[i][size=3][u]
[color=#ff00ff]Bethseda.net PC
https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3070794

https://bethesda.net/en/mods/skyrim/mod-detail/3079918[/u][/size][/i][/color]
